lead_paragraph: Boy, Twitter had a big day. No, it did not score 40 points and win an N.B.A. finals game like Kobe Bryant. But it did get to announce the birth of the cyclist Lance Armstrong’s latest child.
snippet: Boy, Twitter had a big day. No, it did not score 40 points and win an N.B.A. finals game like Kobe Bryant. But it did get to announce the birth of the cyclist Lance Armstrong’s latest child.
